title: Have not got my Mark of the star guardian icon....
body:
One week ago I did the quest for the "Mark of the Star guardian" summoner icon on your page. 
And I also did it a couple of times. BUT I STILL have not got the summoner icon and I am very dissapointed..
Can you please send it to me? Cause I reeeeally wanted that icon... Sight.
 {{sticker:slayer-jinx-unamused}}

replies.body: I haven't seen any issues with the mark of the star guardian icon being unlocked for accounts; though, a week does seem to be a bit.  If you retake the quiz, are you logged in and does it say your icon has already been redeemed after you take it again?  Let me know!
I haven't gotten my Mark as well, I need that icon, Lux is all I play :(
I didn't get my icon either. I've done the quiz like three times (i was logged in), and almost two weeks have passed.
